title: Repearing client problem
body: Hi , I would like to propose a problem i'm having for couple of days now , the problem started when I copied/past LOL to my brothers USB . when I tried to launch the client after that I recevied a message contains that my client has been corrupted somehow and it needs to be fixed . The repearing process started at 700MB & when it's completed there was another patch of 12G !!! Left my PC on all night to download everything and when it's done it was all good , BUT when I restarted the client , it once again started downlading everything from 0!!! It's like it has been deleted for no reason. I don't know what caused this problem since I didn't delete or remove anything , plz help :'( .{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: It sounds like the game files either didn't fully transfer correctly or some of the files were corrupted in the process. I'd honestly suggest running the game installer the normal way to get it installed on the other pc. It might be worth it to update some network settings using the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a resource, or possibly using an ethernet cord to be sure you've got a stable connection during that download.
